input_text:
Job Title: Principal Electrical Engineer

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Title: Principal Electrical EngineerJob Location: New York, NYYears of Experience: 15+ yearsRecent Industry Experience: Electrical
Job Description: Responsibilities:Provide exceptional leadership for project teams as well as the broader group, driving successful outcomes and ensuring project objectives are achieved.Mentor and coach colleagues, fostering a culture of innovation, creativity, and meaningful delegation within the team.Work closely with clients, architects, and other team members as part of a dedicated and skilled group, collaborating to deliver world-class solutions.Oversee the production of coordinated detailed design drawings, specifications, site observation reports, schedules, and other project deliverables to ensure the highest quality standards.Take ownership of building and sustaining productive client relationships, proactively addressing client needs, and ensuring overall client satisfaction.Direct multiple projects across the group, ensuring the successful implementation of engineering solutions while ensuring financial success.Continually maintain and develop the highest standards of technical quality, staying at the forefront of industry advancements and best practices.Ensure engineering practices, policies, and services align with the client's best interests and comply with current legislation and building codes.Actively contribute to delivering profitable projects, monitoring financial performance, resourcing, and expenditure. Must have: Possess 15+ years of extensive experience in Electrical Engineering design within the building services and construction industry.A bachelor's or master's degree in electrical engineering or a relevant field.A thorough understanding of building codes and mechanical design principles.Proven track record of successful project delivery in various sectors and regions.Excellent technical knowledge of electrical systems, including good technical knowledge of other MEP building systems, with an ability to investigate and provide effective solutions to technical challenges.Familiarity with industry-standard software like Revit for detailed design drawings and analysis tools, such as SKM and SAM, to develop innovative and energy-efficient solutions.Proven experience in a leadership capacity within an MEP Engineering Consultancy or related field. Nice to have:Proven success in business development, client acquisition, and maintaining long-term client relationships.LEED AP accreditation is preferred, reflecting a commitment to sustainable design practices.Professional Engineer (P.E.) or hold equivalent professional certification.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Principal Electrical Engineer
output_json.summary:
Job Title: Principal Electrical Engineer
Location: New York, NY
Employment Type: full-time
job_responsibilities: Provide exceptional leadership for project teams.
Work closely with clients, architects, and team members.
Oversee the production of project deliverables.
Maintain and develop technical quality standards.
Ensure compliance with legislation and building codes.

other.content: A bachelor's or master's degree in electrical engineering or a relevant field.
Possess 15+ years of extensive experience in Electrical Engineering design within the building services and construction industry.
Thorough understanding of building codes and mechanical design principles.
Proven track record of successful project delivery in various sectors and regions.
Familiarity with industry-standard software like Revit for detailed design drawings and analysis tools, such as SKM and SAM.
Proven experience in a leadership capacity within an MEP Engineering Consultancy or related field.
Proven success in business development, client acquisition, and maintaining long-term client relationships.
LEED AP accreditation is preferred, reflecting a commitment to sustainable design practices.
